Problem: High-Speed Data Transfer: A tech company needs to transfer large amounts of data between servers located in different parts of the world. An engineering solution might be to use fiber optic cables, which can transfer data at higher speeds without generating heat. However, this solution would require a significant investment in new infrastructure and training for staff.
Contradictory Parameters: Weight of moving object vs. Speed
